rect.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); visibility: hidden;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 721px; paint-order: fill; stroke: rgb(186, 218, 85); white-space: pre; visibility: hidden;

path.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 10px; stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-dasharray: 30; stroke-dashoffset: -36px;
paint-order: stroke; stroke: url(#color-0); fill: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); stroke-width: 10px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30; stroke-dashoffset: -47px;
stroke-width: 10px; stroke: url(#color-0); fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 30; stroke-dashoffset: -70px;
